medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abrupt onset of abdominal pain starting the evening prior to presentation, lasting 18 hours. The patient reports one episode of vomiting without nausea or fevers/chills, and states this pain feels significantly different than her previous GERD symptoms.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of GERD, HL, Hepatitis (unknown type), Narrow angle glaucoma
